parameters.description: ID for the workspace where the invite requests were made.
parameters.name: team_id

parameters.description: Value of the `next_cursor` field sent as part of the previous API response
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: The number of results that will be returned by the API on each invocation. Must be between 1 - 1000, both inclusive
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: This method either only returns a brief _OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
schema.title: Default success template
